name: CloudMoyo
tagline: Partner of choice for Cloud, Analytics & AI
description:
CloudMoyo is the partner of choice for solutions at the intersection of cloud and analytics. We help modern enterprises define their path to the Cloud and leverage the power of data driven insights.
As a leading Cloud & AI partner for Microsoft, CloudMoyo brings together powerful machine learning, artificial intelligence and analytics solutions using the Azure Data Platform to modernize the data landscape and transform data into actionable business insights for its Fortune 1000 customers across multiple industry sectors including transportation, high technology, manufacturing, pharmaceuticals, financial services, e-commerce and retail
Headquartered in Bellevue, WA, with an innovation center in Pune, India, and a presence in Kansas City, CloudMoyo is poised to help intelligent enterprises build innovative solutions and help them stay ahead in the disruption cycle.
